articles.description: Emily Seebohm has opened up about her bitter break-up with former swimming partner Mitch Larkin, saying it 'sucked'. Read more.
articles.content:
Olympic swimming champion Emily Seebohm has opened up about her past relationship with former swimming partner and boyfriend Mitch Larkin.
The 29-year-old revealed to former MAFS star Davina Rankin … [+1900 chars]
